input_text:
Job Title: Production Supervisor Electrical

Location: Sandusky, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Integrated Talent Strategies (ITS) is seeking a Production Supervisor Electrical to work in the Sandusky, OH area. This is a direct hire position that offers a variety of great benefits, including health insurance, 401(k), and paid time off.

Individuals in this position oversee daily operations, coordinate and schedule workflow, and manage a team within the Electrical Assembly Department.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Ensures that the department meets daily objectives in terms of safety, on-time delivery of job orders, accurate employee documentation of work completed, quality, and physical inventoryEstablishes priorities, availability or capability of employees, parts, material, machines, and equipmentFollows block schedule to ensure completion of job orders in a timely fashionEnsures all parts are accounted for and properly processed before moving job orders to the next departmentMaintains inventory of materials and parts needed to complete productionEstablishes continuous improvement culture including 5S organization and visual management systemsSafely operates equipment in a steel fabrication environmentUnderstands proper set-up of department equipmentEnsures that all department employees have necessary materials, parts, and tools to workOther duties as assigned

SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES:

Directly supervises Operation Team Lead and the employees within the work cellCarries out leadership responsibilities in accordance with the company's proceduresTrains employeesPlans, assigns, and directs workAppraises performance, rewards employees, addresses complaints and resolves problemsInvolved in departmental hiring process

About Integrated Talent Strategies (ITS)

ITS is an international recruiting and staffing firm specializing in Engineering, Technical and Professional positions. Founded in 1984 as a subsidiary of an engineering firm, ITS continues to remain a strategic partner for the job seeker.

Our clients include some of the largest and most respected architectural, engineering, and manufacturing companies in business today. Our ability to offer a wide range of services, and the flexibility to adjust to the changing needs of our clients, has allowed us to maintain a solid reputation for 40 years.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Production Supervisor Electrical
output_json.summary: Integrated Talent Strategies (ITS) seeks a Production Supervisor Electrical for the Sandusky, OH area.
job_responsibilities: Ensures daily objectives in safety, on-time delivery, accurate documentation, quality, and physical inventory.
Manages a team within the Electrical Assembly Department.
Follows block schedule for timely job order completion.
Ensures all parts are accounted for and properly processed.
Maintains inventory of materials and parts.
Safely operates equipment in a steel fabrication environment.
Understands proper setup of department equipment.
Ensures employees have necessary materials, parts, and tools.
output_json.company_information: Integrated Talent Strategies (ITS) is an international recruiting and staffing firm specializing in Engineering, Technical, and Professional positions.
